mapper.select: SELECT CODE.CODE_VAL, CODE.CODE_VAL_DESC FROM TMB_EVENT EVT LEFT OUTER JOIN TMB_CODE CODE ON SUBSTRING(EVT.EVT_CLNT_CODE, 1, 6) = CODE.CODE_VAL WHERE SUBSTRING(EVT.EVT_PARTNER_CODE, 1, 6) = #{userCodeVal} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(EVT.EVT_CLNT_CODE, 1, 6), CODE.CODE_VAL_DESC ORDER BY CODE.CODE_VAL
SELECT CODE_VAL, CODE_VAL_DESC FROM TMB_CODE WHERE CODE_DIV = 'REV' ORDER BY CODE_VAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMB_EVENT ( EVT_CLNT_CODE, EVT_PARTNER_CODE, EVT_USER_NM, EVT_USER_AGE, EVT_USER_PH_NUM, EVT_AR_NM, EVT_STS_CD, EVT_SURVEY1, EVT_SURVEY2, EVT_SURVEY3, EVT_SURVEY4, EVT_SURVEY5, EVT_SURVEY6, EVT_DESC, EVT_IP, REG_DT ) VALUES ( CONCAT(#{clientModal}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i')), CONCAT(#{partnerModal}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i')), #{evtUserNm}, #{evtUserAge}, #{evtUserPhNum}, #{evtArNm}, #{revModal}, #{evtSurvey1}, #{evtSurvey2}, #{evtSurvey3}, #{evtSurvey4}, #{evtSurvey5}, #{evtSurvey6}, #{evtDesc}, #{evtIp}, NOW() )
